name: Heal the Heart
description:
THIS GAME IS VERY UNFINISHED AND SCUFFED, IM VERY DISAPPOINTED AT HOW IT TURNED OUT BUT AT LEAST I GOT TO SUBMIT IT POG

This is my entry to the "My First Game Jam" game jam, and literally is my first game jam project, i tried to follow the theme and had a pretty solid idea but i didn't give the project much time and it ended being incomplete so i just uploaded it how it is. 

The game is simple, there is a heart at the center of the screen and every now and then a turret spawns and starts shooting at it, what you have to do is press the heart with the left mouse button or press space while aiming at it in order to heal it, and upgrade your healing power whenever you've done a certain number of heals, but you'll have to pay attention to the turrets, they may not do much damage at first but the more you kill them the more stronger they get.

YOU CAN SLOW TIME BY PRESSING [ E ]
